MarketAdded(address,address).details: Emitted when a Market is added to the pool.

PoolMetadataUpdated(address,(uint8,strin.details: Emitted when a pool metadata is updated.

PoolNameSet(address,string).details: Emitted when a pool name is set.

PoolRegistered(address,(string,address,a.details: Emitted when a new Venus pool is added to the directory.

createRegistryPool(string,address,addres.details: Deploys a new Venus pool and adds to the directory.

params.name: The name of the pool.
params.proxyAdmin: The address of the ProxyAdmin contract.

returns.index: The index of the registered Venus pool.

getAllPools().details: This function is not designed to be called in a transaction: it is too gas-intensive.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

_bookmarks.details: Maps Ethereum accounts to arrays of Venus pool Comptroller proxy contract addresses.

_poolByComptroller.details: Maps comptroller address to Venus pool Index.

_poolsByID.details: Array of Venus pool comptroller addresses. Used for iterating over all pools

_supportedPools.details: Maps asset to list of supported pools.

_vTokens.details: Maps pool id to asset to vToken.

metadata.details: Maps venus pool id to metadata

addMarket((address,address,uint8,string,.notice: Add a market to an existing pool

bookmarkPool(address).notice: Bookmarks a Venus pool Unitroller (Comptroller proxy) contract addresses.

getAllPools().notice: Returns arrays of all Venus pools' data.

getBookmarks(address).notice: Returns arrays of Venus pool Unitroller (Comptroller proxy) contract addresses bookmarked by `account`.

updatePoolMetadata(address,(uint8,string.notice: Update metadata of an existing pool

userdoc.notice: PoolRegistry is a registry for Venus interest rate pools.
